data.name: UnScared
data.detailed_description:
UnScared you play as someone who break in to an old Asylum that have been shut down to illegal experiments. After a terrible incident one of the patients have transformed into an creepy creature that still living in there. Will be no helps or clues so you have to find your way out by your own. Remember... your are ALONE!

Features:
- Flashlight (with some batteries hidden)
- Lighter (so you can see if you run out of betteries)
- Newspapers and documents spread out
- Some jumpscares

data.short_description: Break in to an old abandoned Asylum that have been shut down to illegal experiments. After a terrible incident one of the patients have transformed into an creepy creature that still living in there. Will be no helps or clues so you have to find your way out by your own. Remember... your are ALONE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel I3 2.40Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
